meanings.definition: To bring back into a situation or activity
meanings.sent1: The coach decided to reinvolve the injured player in the game after a quick recovery.
meanings.sent2: The company needed to reinvolve its customers by offering new and exciting products.

meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist reinvolved the viewers in the movie.
meanings.sent5: The music festival reinvolved the community in celebrating together.
